page.title: 07LORD MOUNTBATTEN
page.content: {Lord Mountbatten}was born on July 17 1900. He was a memember of the{Royal {Family.}When he was six he was very interested in the{Royal Navy}and became a Captain. His home is called {Broadlands.}It is probably one of the biggest mansions and estates in {Hampshire.}He had a wife called {Edwina.}In 1979 Lord Mountbatten took his family on a boat and did not know that the I.R.A had planted a bomb on board the ship and it killed him but the rest survied.His Greatgrandmother was very proud of her new Greatgrandson . Lord Mountbatten had a Labrador .Nearly every day in the shooting season he went pheasant shooting .His car was a Rolls Royce. He had a Grandson called Lord Romsey who took over Broadlands.
